S And W Revolver.description: Higher powered version of the 6 round revolver.

Browning Semi-automatic.description: More power and more rounds between reloads equals more killing!

Remington.description: A standard among pump action shotguns. Not as powerful, but if you can shoot more between reloading, does it matter?

Knife.description: Slice and dice! Not a machete, but bigger than a pocketknife.

Kris Knife.description: Ornate and with alternating curves in its very sharp blade, there is something disturbingly mysterious about this weapon.

Baseball Bat.description: Doesn't hurt much, but at least you won't cut up your fists.

Pickaxe.description: Intended for mining, but works as a weapon in a pinch.

Acid Concoction.description: Melt the hide off anything crawling. Just don't spill it in your pack.

Holy Water.description: Useful against the undead but not much else. Except as drinking water.
